blog.name: tinylilemrys
blog.title: I'll Write My Way Out
blog.description: Aislynn (Ash or Tiny), 27, bi, she/her, INFP. Proud ADHD Ravenclaw and Scottish/South African hybrid. Aspiring musician, writer, and funny person. Much like my life, my blog is a mess. You can find all of my writing on AO3 (tinylilremus), all my music on SoundCloud (Aislynn Price) and I'm @tinylilemrys on Twitter too. Icon by the awesome @daciafu!

tags: i can't get enough of it
body:

summary: i feel like the current uh. pirates arc i guess?lol has focused a lot on fjord, rightfully so ofc! but in focusing on fjord i...
question: i feel like the current uh. pirates arc i guess?lol has focused a lot on fjord, rightfully so ofc! but in focusing on fjord i feel like some cool little things have been forgotten about bc of the tension and intrigue. like, i was really glad matt had caleb roll a wisdom save again, i've rlly been missing jester writing/drawing in her journal to the point where i'm wondering if she even does it anymore? i really wish cad's tea would be a bigger thing also! idk hopefully u know what i mean
answer: u right. Like, I love Fjord and all, but geez I want them to have a break and go shopping and go pull pranks on temples and old people and focus on their own tiny little quirks.

reblog.comment: u right. Like, I love Fjord and all, but geez I want them to have a break and go shopping and go pull pranks on temples and old people and focus on their own tiny little quirks.

trail.content_raw: u right. Like, I love Fjord and all, but geez I want them to have a break and go shopping and go pull pranks on temples and old people and focus on their own tiny little quirks.
trail.content: u right. Like, I love Fjord and all, but geez I want them to have a break and go shopping and go pull pranks on temples and old people and focus on their own tiny little quirks.

tags: this is how the episode ended right?
summary: Nott, calling down the hall: Fjord, before you go to the archipelago, did you remember to repair your ship?  Fjord, yelling...
body:
Nott, calling down the hall: Fjord, before you go to the archipelago, did you remember to repair your ship?

Fjord, yelling back: Yeah, Mom! I repaired the ship! Can I leave now?

Nott: If you’re sure you repaired the ship, then yes. But are you sure?

Fjord, walking outside: Yea-

Ship: Is still broken

Fjord, running back in: Shit, shit! Orly, change course for Bisaft Island before Mom sees!

reblog.comment:

Fjord, yelling back: Yeah, Mom! I repaired the ship! Can I leave now?

Fjord, walking outside: Yea-

Ship: Is still broken

Fjord, running back in: Shit, shit! Orly, change course for Bisaft Island before Mom sees!

Fjord, running back in: Shit, shit! Orly, change course for Bisaft Island before Mom sees!

summary: Just finished listening to Caleb's playlist and I'm so, so, so, so very happy Giver by K. Flay made it on there (not the normal...
body:
Just finished listening to Caleb’s playlist and I’m so, so, so, so very happy Giver by K. Flay made it on there (not the normal album version, still good though)

My headcanon playlist has Run Boy Run by Woodkid and Arsonist’s Lullaby by Hozier is on it still though

micah • 19 • follow/reply from @notskeleton

bidet, everyone! critical role has more or less taken over my life, so i figured it was about time that my current obsession got its own space. feel free to shoot me an ask any time! i'd love any excuse to talk about this great cast and their characters. oh, and also i technically draw and write sometimes.
